name: International Conference on Epidemiology & Public Health
content: We will be glad and feel immense pleasure to invite the global participants from across the world to attend International Conference on Epidemiology & Public Health during on August 21-22, 2023 as per Singapore Time Zone. The theme of this conference is “Novel ways and implementation methods of current trends in epidemiology and public health” which includes prompt Keynote Presentations, Special Sessions, Workshop, Oral talks, Poster Presentations and Sponsors/Exhibitors. It is to spread knowledge about epidemiology and other factors relating to health to reduce the death rate because of lack of awareness among people. The aim of the conference is to provide a platform to the researchers and practitioners from both academia as well as industry to meet the share cutting-edge development in the field. In the field of medicine, clinicians cure diseases and injuries one patient one time. The sessions of the conference include mental health, mental disorder, non-communicable diseases, public health and disability, hygienic and food nutrition, and many more topics of public health 2023.
